titles.title: REVIEW Act of 2025
Regulatory Efficiency, Verification, Itemization, and Enhanced Workflow Act of 2025
REVIEW Act of 2025
To require the Federal financial institutions regulatory agencies to review the cumulative impact of regulations issued by such agencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 30 - 23.
